games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: An open-world action-adventure RPG set in the dystopian future of Night City. Play as V, a mercenary seeking immortality through a cybernetic implant. Features deep character customization, branching storylines, and immersive cyberpunk atmosphere.

games.name: Candy Crush Saga
games.description: A popular match-three puzzle game where players swap colored candies to create matches and clear levels. Features hundreds of levels, special candies, and social features. Perfect for casual gaming sessions.

games.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
games.description: A military first-person shooter featuring intense multiplayer combat and cinematic single-player campaign. Includes realistic weapons, tactical gameplay, and competitive multiplayer modes with various maps and game types.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game where players can build, explore, and survive in procedurally generated worlds made of blocks. Features creative mode for building, survival mode for adventure, and multiplayer servers for social play.

games.name: The Witcher 3
games.description: An epic fantasy RPG following Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter in a vast open world. Features rich storytelling, complex characters, moral choices, and extensive side quests in a beautifully crafted medieval fantasy setting.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together on a spaceship while trying to identify impostors among the crew. Features deception, teamwork, and quick rounds perfect for party gaming.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An open-world western action-adventure game set in the American frontier. Play as Arthur Morgan, an outlaw in the dying days of the Wild West. Features stunning landscapes, realistic horse riding, and immersive storytelling.

games.name: Tetris
games.description: The classic puzzle game where players arrange falling blocks to create complete lines. Features simple yet addictive gameplay, increasing speed, and timeless appeal. Perfect for quick gaming sessions and nostalgic fun.

games.name: Elden Ring
games.description: A dark fantasy action RPG featuring challenging combat, vast open world exploration, and deep lore. Created by FromSoftware, it combines Souls-like difficulty with expansive environments and epic boss battles.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.description: An open-world action-adventure game set in Los Santos. Play as three different protagonists in an interconnected story of heists, crime, and survival in a satirical recreation of modern Southern California.

games.name: FIFA 24
games.description: The latest installment in the FIFA series featuring updated rosters, improved gameplay mechanics, and enhanced graphics. Experience realistic football simulation with career mode, ultimate team, and online multiplayer.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Embark on a legendary Viking saga as Eivor in 9th century England. Build settlements, forge alliances, and lead raids in this epic action RPG that blends history with mythology.

games.name: Valorant
games.description: A tactical 5v5 character-based shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Compete in ranked matches and prove your skills in this free-to-play competitive FPS.

games.name: Stardew Valley
games.description: A charming farming simulation game where you inherit your grandfather's old farm plot. Grow crops, raise animals, mine, fish, and build relationships with the townspeople in this relaxing indie game.

games.name: League of Legends
games.description: A competitive 5v5 MOBA where two teams of champions battle to destroy the enemy Nexus. Choose from over 160 unique champions and climb the ranked ladder in this free-to-play esports phenomenon.

games.name: Overwatch 2
games.description: A team-based hero shooter featuring diverse heroes with unique abilities. Fight for the future in 6v6 battles across iconic locations in this fast-paced competitive FPS.

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.description: A challenging 2D Metroidvania featuring a mysterious insect knight exploring the fallen kingdom of Hallownest. Discover ancient secrets, battle fierce creatures, and master precise platforming.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.description: A free-to-play battle royale shooter set in the Titanfall universe. Choose from unique Legends with special abilities and compete in squads of three in fast-paced matches on diverse maps.

games.name: Genshin Impact
games.description: An open-world action RPG featuring anime-style graphics and elemental combat. Explore the fantasy world of Teyvat, collect characters with unique abilities, and uncover the mysteries of this gacha game.

games.name: Fall Guys
games.description: A colorful battle royale party game featuring jellybean-like characters competing in wacky obstacle courses. Survive elimination rounds and be the last bean standing in this fun multiplayer experience.
